about_the_game:
A special item pack loaded with handy adventuring items.

Content includes:
• Artifacts
- 10% Off General Store
Reduces the price of items available at general stores by 10%.
- 20% SP Boost
Increases SP earned from battle by 20%.
- 20% EXP Boost
Earn 20% more EXP in battle.

• Consumable Items
- Life Bottle x5
- Sage x5
- Lavender x5
- Verbena x5
- Rosemary x5
- Saffron x5
- Chamomile x5
- Jasmine x5
- Red Sage x5
- Red Lavender x5
- Red Verbena x5
- Red Rosemary x5
- Red Saffron x5
- Red Chamomile x5
- Red Jasmine x5

• Food
- Rice x10
- Rappig Meat x20
- Pepper x30
- Tofu x10
- Wheat x20
- Potato x20
- Mushroom x20
- Carp x20
- Scrap Meat x10
- Apple x10
- Lettuce x10
- Tomato x10
- Milk x10
- Chicken x10
- Pork x10
- Salmon x10

• Gald
- 100,000 Gald
Grants 100,000 gald (in-game currency).

*This content will be available in-game after claiming it from the in-game Unclaimed DLC List.

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Tales of Arise - Premium Item Pack - $9.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Tales of Arise - Premium Item Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit Only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 or Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit Only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX-8350
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset

short_description: A special item pack loaded with handy adventuring items.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
